p: We constructed three different 2-strain models for MERS-CoV that consider community human-human, hospital human-human, and passive zoonotic transmission ( Fig 1C and see also S1– S18 Tables). Models derived also incorporate the effect of strain variability with strain-1 as the dominant strain ( Fig 1C and S1– S18 Tables). Variability among models is based upon three different disease incidence functions (e.g. BL, NM and SAT models [ 21– 23] and see formulation in Table 1A and Fig 2).
